990:5: ramaṇīyāni puṇyāni phalaṃ teṣāṃ paraṃ śubham |
990:6: tasmāt kuruta puṇyāni nāsti puṇyasamaṃ dhanam ||1||
990:9: puṇyaṃ kṛtvā gatā devāḥ puṇyaṃ nayati sadgatim |
990:10: puṇyaṃ kṛtvā narā loke modante tridive hi (te) ||3||
990:12: puṇyādhikā hi puruṣā bhavanti sukhinaḥ sadā |
990:13: tasmāt kuruta puṇyāni nāsti puṇyasamaṃ sukham ||4||
990:14: puṇyaṃ kṛtvā gatā devāḥ puṇyapriyadhanasya ca |
990:15: hetubhūtaṃ sadā dṛṣṭaṃ tasmāt puṇyaṃ paraṃ sukham ||5||
990:18: tasmāt sukhaṃ paraṃ puṇyaṃ nāsti puṇyādṛte sukham ||6||
990:24: kutasteṣāṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sikatāsu yathā ghṛtam ||8||
990:26: na teṣāṃ vidyate śarma duḥkhaṃ teṣāmanuttaram ||9||
990:28: mānuṣyaṃ sukṛtaṃ hyetat kṛte bhavati dehinaḥ |
990:30: priyo bhavati yasyātmā yasya saukhye sthitā matiḥ |
990:38: puṇyakārī sadā dānto padaṃ gacchati cāvyayam |
990:41: vicitraṃ hi kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ vicitraṃ paripacyate |
990:45: yo (hi) dharma parityajya ramate kukṛte naraḥ |
990:51: yo hi deśayate dharma pareṣāṃ hitakāṅkṣayā |
990:52: sa mātā sa pitā caiva nirvāṇapuradeśakaḥ ||17||
990:56: na mūlyaṃ vidyate śāstuḥ subhāṣitapadasya vai ||18||
990:58: na padaṃ labhate śāntaṃ yad dhanairupalabhyate |
990:59: dravyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na dharmo buddhibandhanam ||19||
990:61: dravyaṃ vinaśyati nṛṇāṃ dharmadravyaṃ na jātu vai |
990:69: dharma ekaḥ paraṃ trāṇaṃ dharma ekaḥ parā gatiḥ |
990:76: sa tadā duḥkhamāpnoti narakeṣu punaḥ punaḥ ||25||
990:85: puṇyaprabhāvo vipulo yasya śīle rataṃ manaḥ ||28||
990:88: dharmo hi nayati svarga dharmacārī sukhānvitaḥ ||29||
990:93: śreyo bhaveddhi maraṇaṃ na tu dharmavigarhaṇam |
990:94: dharmeṇa varjito lokaḥ saṃsāre sarvadā bhramet ||31||
990:97: vṛthā saukhyamidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāto yathā'paraḥ ||32||
990:101: prayānti tat padaṃ śāntaṃ yatra duḥkhaṃ na vidyate ||34||
990:103: indriyāṇāṃ vaśe yastu viṣayeṣu tathaiva ca |
990:109: buddho yeṣāṃ bahumato nityaṃ dharmaśca gocaraḥ |
990:117: udyogānāṃ sadā dhyānaṃ yena gacchati nirvṛtim ||40||
990:123: mātā pitṛsamaḥ pūjya upādhyāyaḥ sadā bhavet |
990:126: agrāhyā vā sadā dṛṣṭā muninā tattvadarśinā |
990:127: sukhasya bhūmayo hyetā niḥsukhā viṣayā matāḥ ||44||
990:129: saukhyaṃ tasya bhavennityaṃ na saukhyaṃ devabhūmiṣu ||45||
990:131: sa āhūya prayatnena sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ ||46||
990:132: anāgate bhayaṃ yo hi paśyati buddhacakṣuṣā |
990:136: sa hi vighne tu samprāpte na viṣādena bādhyate ||48||
990:140: yāvat samagraṃ janmedaṃ jñānaṃ yāti vināvilam |
990:142: kṣayaṃ prayānti puṇyāni tvaritaṃ yāti jīvitam |
990:144: yo hi dharma parityajya pramādopahato naraḥ |
990:145: na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa paścādapi tapyate ||52||
990:146: na yāvadāyāti jarā na vyādhiḥ saha mṛtyunā |
990:147: tāvat kāryāṇi puṇyāni mā paścāt paritapyatha ||53||
990:150: kiṃ tasya jīvitenārthaḥ kiṃ bhāgyaiḥ kiṃ ca bāndhavaiḥ |
990:151: sabalendriyatāṃ prāpya yo na dharmarataḥ sadā ||55||
990:153: viratiścāpi pāpebhyaḥ sādhūnāṃ darśane na ca ||56||
990:154: śīlena yaḥ suro janma labdhvedaṃ kāmamohitaḥ |
990:155: na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa bhavaṃ nātivartate ||57||
990:159: devāste hi sadā vandyā ye dharme niratāḥ sadā |
990:160: ye tu nityaṃ bhavāsaktāste sarve nidhanaṃ gatāḥ ||59||
990:167: saṅgṛhītaṃ sadā śīlaṃ jñānaṃ ca parivartitam |
990:171: tasmād doṣān parityajya guṇāḥ sevyāḥ prayatnataḥ ||63||
990:176: prāpya janmāntara cāpi nirvṛtiṃ cāśu gacchati ||65||
